name: Set Split View
description: Configure a split-screen view with synchronized or independent panes for side-by-side comparisons, before/after analysis, or multi-context exploration. This is a streaming UI tool that displays two components simultaneously with adjustable ratio and optional linked scrolling. Use this for: comparing agent outputs, before/after code, dual dashboards, multi-model responses, or any scenario requiring parallel views. More focused than set_ui_layout's generic split mode.

componentId.description: Component to mount in left pane (e.g., 'agent:agent-registry', 'cost:cost-dashboard')

props.description: Props to pass to left component

title.description: Optional title for left pane header (1-50 characters)

componentId.description: Component to mount in right pane

props.description: Props to pass to right component

title.description: Optional title for right pane header (1-50 characters)

ratio.description: Width ratio of left pane (0.1-0.9). Default 0.5 (equal split). Example: 0.6 = 60% left, 40% right.

linkScroll.description: Synchronize scroll position between panes (for comparing similar content). Default: false.

dividerLocked.description: Prevent user from dragging divider to adjust ratio. Default: false (user can resize).

animate.description: Enable smooth animated transition for split view setup. Default: true.
